ValidationRule.description: Cannot change the Account Name on unmatched or unidentified regional accounts. These are read only accounts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
/* DO NOT ever add the override validation rule*/
AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Name), NOT( $Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), OR( UPPER(PRIORVALUE(Name)) = "NA UNMATCH", UPPER(PRIORVALUE(Name)) = "APAC UNMATCH", UPPER(PRIORVALUE(Name)) = "EMEA UNMATCH", UPPER(PRIORVALUE(Name)) = "UNIDENTIFIED REGION ACCOUNT", UPPER(Name) = "NA UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "APAC UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "EMEA UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "UNIDENTIFIED REGION ACCOUNT" ) ), AND( ISNEW(), OR( UPPER(Name) = "NA UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "APAC UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "EMEA UNMATCH", UPPER(Name) = "UNIDENTIFIED REGION ACCOUNT" ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We are not allowed to Create/Modify the exceptional account buckets with name starts with 'NA Unmatch', 'APAC Unmatch', 'EMEA Unmatch', 'Unidentified Region Account'. These are read only accounts.
